content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"CIAs explained\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"A CIA is an agreement between healthcare companies and the Office of Inspector General of the U.S. Department of Health and Human Services (in this course we will refer to this regulator as the OIG). It outlines the obligations an entity agrees to as part of a civil settlement with the Federal Government.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":2029,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/a27bb7f7-7ce4-4e65-98d8-b609aaa2634d/1.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/a27bb7f7-7ce4-4e65-98d8-b609aaa2634d/1.PNG?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-left\",\"fileName\":\"1.PNG\",\"name\":\"1.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"a27bb7f7-7ce4-4e65-98d8-b609aaa2634d\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":294,\"height\":89},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Mandatory Obligations\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"A CIA includes mandatory compliance obligations the company must implement and follow in exchange for the OIGâ€™s agreement that it will not seek to exclude the entity from participation in federal health care programs. OIG also assigns a government monitor to assure that the company meets the requirements of Federal health care programs and the CIA.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":7131,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/3756c761-39d7-4a58-aa3a-f7052099c3b8/Picture2.jpg?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/3756c761-39d7-4a58-aa3a-f7052099c3b8/Picture2.jpg?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"Picture2.jpg\",\"name\":\"Picture2.jpg\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"jpeg\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"3756c761-39d7-4a58-aa3a-f7052099c3b8\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":241,\"height\":136},\"extension\":\"jpg\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":2099,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/98b53b61-67ad-483a-8e0a-6b65c4386a6c/2.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/98b53b61-67ad-483a-8e0a-6b65c4386a6c/2.PNG?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"2.PNG\",\"name\":\"2.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"98b53b61-67ad-483a-8e0a-6b65c4386a6c\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":293,\"height\":92},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Duration\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"CIAs typically have a duration of 5 years and the company must submit reports to the OIG to document compliance with the requirements of the CIA.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":2130,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/51144adc-a3f8-4ebb-b413-9e2ca961ee8a/3.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/51144adc-a3f8-4ebb-b413-9e2ca961ee8a/3.PNG?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"3.PNG\",\"name\":\"3.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"51144adc-a3f8-4ebb-b413-9e2ca961ee8a\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":289,\"height\":94},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Independent Review Organization (IRO)\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"In addition, the government may require that the organization be subject to external audits by an Independent Review Organization (IRO). An IRO, which is usually a consulting or accounting firm, must provide the OIG with evidence of its independence and objectivity in order to conduct the audits set forth in CIAs. These audits are conducted on an annual basis and the results are reported to the OIG.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
